body: RIP Mogudan you were a true artist and follower of your waifu Ayanami Rei. Let's hope that the bad times may cease, so that you can show your dedication once again. Studio Khara shall perish!!!
FYI, mogudan is a woman with a cat lol

All you niggas are blind, this coloring is shallow af, it barely has ane deep and seems rushed in comparison to the black amd white version.
This shows what we all already knew:
The average Evangelion retard is tasteless
yes yes yes yes yes yes perfect
Way out of character, horrible proportions, and she somehow didn't get pregnant. Wow. I say it's a 3/10
colors make it sooo much better

the art is good but characters and story and such make his work C grade now :(
Every single thing Mogudan has EVER done is EXACTLY THE SAME. Same plot, same premise, same scenario.
Her boobs get fucking abnormally big with every release that it's just a major turn off of this series now.
